Interface_name: WebSocket Server - side by using FastAPI in python
Instruction:
Task Description: Implement a WebSocket connection manager class for handling multiple client connections, supporting different subprotocols (JSON and BYTES), and managing message sending/receiving.

Class Description: The ConnectionManager class manages active WebSocket connections, handles different WebSocket subprotocols, and provides methods for sending/receiving messages in the appropriate format.

Attributes:
- active_connections: List[WebSocket] - Maintains a list of currently active WebSocket connections
- protocol_dict: Dict[str, WebsocketSubProtocols] - Maps client addresses to their chosen subprotocols

Methods:
- get_client(websocket: WebSocket) -> str - Returns a string identifier for the client (host:port)
- get_subprotocol(headers: Dict) -> WebsocketSubProtocols - Determines the subprotocol from request headers
- connect(websocket: WebSocket) -> None - Accepts a new WebSocket connection and stores its subprotocol
- disconnect(websocket: WebSocket) -> None - Removes a disconnected WebSocket from active connections
- receive(websocket: WebSocket) -> Any - Receives a message from the WebSocket using the appropriate subprotocol
- iter(websocket: WebSocket) -> AsyncIterator[Any] - Provides an async iterator for continuously receiving messages
- send(websocket: WebSocket, data: Union[DataRequest, StatusMessage]) -> None - Sends data through the WebSocket using the appropriate subprotocol
